QuestData.Title: Containment is Key
QuestData.Description: The naga are working with leper gnomes to spread a horrific disease across Zangarmarsh. It's already spread throughout the Steamvault.$B$BClear out anything that's been contaminated and bring me the central gear from Mekgineer Steamrigger, quickly!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 3 Bog Overlords, 6 Coilfang Lepers, and obtain an Irradiated Gear from Mekgineer Steamrigger, then return to Naturalist Bite inside the Steamvault.
QuestData.CompletionText: Be as thorough as possible. The fate of Zangarmarsh depends on it.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad we were able to contain this before it spread across all of Zangarmarsh or further. Thank you.
